rows.label: tlk41700126_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Little Hotaru really loves her nature,
doesn't she?

rows.label: tlk41700126_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I hope one day I can bring her with
me and show her all the amazing flora
Alst's got to offer.

rows.label: tlk41700126_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll keep her safe, don't you worry.
It's the duty of the strong to take
care of the meek.

rows.label: tlk41700126_02_msg0004
rows.name:
'Course, I'd need to be a Driver for all
this to happen.

rows.label: tlk41700126_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Frankly, I'm jealous. What I wouldn't
give to share the company of a lovely
lady like her...
